CustomField.formula:
If( Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c =='DE', CASE(TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c ), "Primary", "WOW! Angebot des Tages", "Featured", "WOW! Angebot der Woche", "Core", "Basket Deal", TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c)),
IF( Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c =='IT' , CASE(TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c ), "Primary", "Imperdibili Giornalieri", "Featured", "Imperdibili Settimanali", "Core", "Offerte Core", TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c)),
IF( Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c =='FR' , CASE(TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c ), "Primary", "Top Bons Plans", "Featured", "Bons Plans", "Core", "Autres Offres", TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c)),
IF( Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c =='ES' , CASE(TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c ), "Primary", "N/A", "Featured", "N/A", "Core", "ofertas semanales", TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c)), TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c)))))
CustomField.label: Local Deal Format
